entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:07 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -27.7°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -31.7°C
Wind: SSW 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
